input: Mountains challenge climbers. Peaks inspire awe. Valleys offer respite.

Mountains challenge climbers.

Climbers must contend with steep slopes and unpredictable weather conditions in these rugged mountains.

"The breathtaking vistas of these peaks inspire awe."

Few people venture to the valleys below the mountain range, seeking refuge from the harsh terrain.
